class_notes: This is an online synchronous course.  Course meets for first half of the semester.  Pre-requisites of BIOS 500 and EPI 530 or 504. Course meets 1/26-3/9 with possible asynchronous exam period the following wek.
course_description: Various topics by Epi faculty. Current topics include Prediction Research, Epidemiology of Respiratory Illness, and Infectious Disease Dynamics.
sections: Class Nbr: 4664, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Gwinn/Janssens, Status: Open
